numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the major soccer league has the highest percentage of colored coaches.
2. The percentage of colored coaches in the major soccer league is still under the percentage of colored players in the major soccer league.
3. I notice that the football league has the lowest percentage of colored coaches.
4. I notice that some sports have mixed percentages of colored coaches.
5. I wonder if the football league has other restrictions.
6. I wonder if these restrictions reduce the number of colored coaches in the football league.
7. I wonder if this situation exists around the world.
8. I wonder if this situation exists only in some specific places.
9. I wonder why jobs are not offered to more colored people for coaching positions.
